turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can help, what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get one of those as meat lovers, and the other as chicken barbecue?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And could I also get extra cheese on both of those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right now Can you review that over for me really quick?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I got 2 medium Pizzas, one Meatlover, and another chicken BBQ with extra cheese on both.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great. Could I just get a price on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, give me a moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for those 2 will be $25.44 is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This looks fine, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This looks fine, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done! your pizzas are in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye!
